Algorithms

Class MAC_approx_location

  • java.lang.Object
    • Algorithms.MAC_approx_location

  • public class MAC_approx_location
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a simple weighted center point algorithm for computing (approximating) the Access Point location from several GEO samples (position & signal strength. This is an educational implementation (for ArielU, OOP course 2017-2018) and should not be use for commercial application.
    Author:
    benmo

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int NUM_OF_POINTS 
      static double POWER
      This function assume the weighted points are sorted by weight (biggest first), assumes all weighted are positive!
